archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries
did.unittitle: George Mason University Archives Intercollegiate Athletics 1979-2000
did.physdesc: 18 containers comprising 6 cubic feet (9 linear feet)

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George Mason University Archives Intercollegiate Athletics, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred to GMU Libraries Special Collections and Archives by the George Mason University Intercollegiate Athletics department.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: George Mason University has over 450 student-athletes competing in 20 Men's and Women's Division I sports - baseball, basketball, cross country, diving, golf, lacrosse, rowing, soccer, softball, swimming, tennis, indoor and outdoor track and field, volleyball, and wrestling. Intercollegiate Men's and Women's teams compete in the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I, the Colonial Athletic Association (CAA), the Eastern College Athletic Conference (ECAC), and the Intercollegiate Association of Amateur Athletes of America.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection contains information (mostly color press guides) relating to George Mason University athletic programs.
